result.execSummary:
The defendant Bernardino Angel Lopez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Bernardino Angel Lopez is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Bernardino Angel Lopez was found guilty of Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bernardino Angel Lopez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Bernardino Angel Lopez
Current: 411 Quartz Ave, Mattoon, WI 54450 United States  (Effective: 01-25-2017)
Prior: N7570 Pine Lane Ave, Spencer, WI 54479 United States

Defendant Bernardino Angel Lopez in court, in custody.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter Susan Rascon appears in person, duly sworn on oath.  Plea agreement stated.  Def to plea to Ct 1 and Ct 2 to be dismissed.  Time served, 22 days plus court cost.  Court reviews plea agreement with def.  Def will accept plea agreement.  Right to an atty reviewed with def.  Ct 1 - Battery  - No contest plea entered.  Constitutional rights, right to jury trial and elements reviewed.  Def wishes to have trial at this time.  Court reviews citizenship.  Court questions def if plea to stand or trial.  Def wishes to proceed with no contest plea.  Balance of rights reviewed.  Def has additional questions.  Court reviews.  Court finds plea entered freely & voluntarily.  Ct 2 dismissed by court consistent with plea agreement.  Facts set forth in complaint.  Court finds factual basis.  Court will accept plea found guilty.  Nothing by def.  Court will accept plea agreement.  Jail 22 days with credit, completed.  Court cost ordered.  DNA sample and surcharge.  Payment plan .  Post conviction rights.

Defendant Bernardino Angel Lopez in court via video, in custody.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter Teresa Berger by phone,duly sworn on oath.  Court reviews court record.  Def advised of right to an atty.  Court instructed def to contact public defender.  Def indicates he does not want an atty.  Court question DA on how the state would proceed.  Plea to ct 1 and ct 2 to be dismissed.  Def will agree to this.  Waiver of right to an atty & plea questionnaire to be provided to def.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 2, 2017 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Bernardino Angel Lopez in court, via video,  in custody.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews court record.  Def failed to appear in court on Feb. 15, 2016, and warrant was issued.  State is requesting cash bond, reasons given.  Bond set by Court.  Condition.  Warrant vacated  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for January 23, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Bernardino Angel Lopez not in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Called at 2:34 pm.  Court reviews file.  State request warrant, $500.00 bond, adjacent counties.  Court will authorize warrant, $500.00 bond or body, adjacent counties

Defendant Bernardino Angel Lopez in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter Teresa Berger duly sworn on oath.  Interpreter appears by phone.  Called at 1:50 pm.  Def does not have copy of complaint.  DA indicates that def has copy of complaint in front of him.  Court reviews charges with possible penalties.  Def advised of right to an atty.  Question if def would be eligible for public defender.  Def works full time and no dependants.  Court appointed atty form in spanish provided to def.   Bond will continue.  Hearing scheduled for February 15, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
